name: SAM
description:
SAM is a videogame where you control a cute little fox, and your objective is to feed your blob friend with healthy food!

But be careful, the other team has the same goal, so you have to be fast picking up the food... or you can try stealing it!

CONTROLS

[HIGHLY RECOMMENDED] XBox controller: Left stick to move - A to spin

Keyboard:

  1.  WASD to move - Space to spin.
  2. Arrows to move - Enter to spin.
  3. TFGH to move - B to spin.
  4. IJKL to move - P to spin.

DOWNLOAD  TO SEE THE REAL CUTENESS

Made by: 

  • Programmers : Carlos Izquierdo & Alberto Mellado
  • Artist: Pablo Monroy & Rodrigo Palomino
  • Designers: Pablo López & Jorge Monedero
